Class EnemyTowerInfluencePropagation

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyTowerInfluencePropagation

    public class EnemyTowerInfluencePropagation
extends WavePropagationWithContext<cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.Tower>
    Class that represents a propagation function that spreads enemy towers influence (from the agent's perspective).
    Author:
    kocur

    • Field Detail

      • logger

        private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger

      • ADDITIONAL_SPREAD_DISTANCE

        public static double ADDITIONAL_SPREAD_DISTANCE
        Because the updates come in intervals, it might happen that we enter towers range and get shot, before are able to escape it. To counter that, we have added a constant, that is added to towers range.

    • Method Detail

      • propagate

        public void propagate(InfluenceLayer l,
                      cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.Tower e)
        Description copied from class: WavePropagationFunction
        This propagates a passed influence layer. In WPF we spread in a wave-like manner. We decrease distance with each step and we spread the influence accordingly.
        Specified by:
        propagate in interface PropagationFunction<cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.Tower>
        Overrides:
        propagate in class WavePropagationWithContext<cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.Tower>

        private void calculateMaxInfluence(double orderOverCreep,
                                   double healthOverMaxHealth)
        Calculates maximum influences from order and health.
        Parameters:
        orderOverCreep - order / CREEP_THRESHOLD
        healthOverMaxHealth - remainingHealth / maxHealth
